evidence.claim: TupeloLife utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3 for data storage and processing.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance as part of its digital therapeutic offerings.
TupeloLife's platform supports FHIR standard for healthcare data transactions, facilitating EHR integration.
Evidence of using Twilio for secure messaging between users and healthcare providers.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction capabilities or relevant use cases found.
